A short note on SPB's life journey..

Sripathi Panditaradhyula Balasubrahmanyam popularly known as S.P.Balasubrahmanyam or SPB , was an Indian playback singer who sang over 40,000 songs in 16 different languages. Balasubrahmaniyam was born in Nellore,Madras Presidency into a Telugu Brahmin family on 4thJune,1946. His father S.P.Sambamurthy was a Harikatha artist who also acted in plays.His mother was Sakunthalama Balasubrahmaniyam began his career as a playback singer on 15 December 1966 with Sri Sri Sri Maryada Ramana,a Telugu film. Balasubrahmaniyam also worked as an actor,television anchor,dubbing artist,music director and film producer. Balasubrahmanyam was married to Savithri and has two children a daughter Pallavi and a son S.P.B.Charan,also a playback singer and film producer. Balasubrahmaniyam died on 25 September 2020 at 1:04pm(IST) of cardio-respiratory arrest over a month-long arrest after a month-long hospitalism due to COVID-19.He was buried in his farmhouse located at Thamaraipakkam in Thiruvallur district on 26 September 2020.
